question: My creatin tested 1.8 and they retested and also tested my urine.  It showed that I had an urinary infection so they put me on an antibiotic.  Then they retested my creatin and it was 1.6.   So they ordered an ultrasound of my kidneys and bladder.   Now they say I have gall stones.  Nothing about my creatin still being 1.6.  They said if I started having pain in my lower side to get an ultrasound of my gallbladder.  I've been having pain forever in my lower side I just thought it was my ovries.  What should I do about my creatin and the gallstones?   Also I have diarhea almost all the time(either from diabetes or diabetes medication)
title: Creatin of 1.6 and gallstones
